name: Cat Story
description:
Cat Story: A puzzling platformer and adventure tale about a cat who loves its fish.

Made using Godot 3.2.3 for the "Godot Wild Jame #27" (https://itch.io/jam/godot-wild-jam-27) for the theme "Books". This is my first project using Godot.

Credits:

Game Design/Programming/Artwork/Music/Sound: mit-mit

Fonts: "Beachday" by Rahagita Studio (Freeware, Non-commercial)

https://www.fontspace.com/hooliday-font-f41799
